episode_event_general_newyear_2022/6701_:
We got some good training in right as the new
year began, huh?

Guess we should get some rest. Gotta be ready
for tomorrow’s battles!

Hm... That came from where we were just
training, didn’t it.
Lightning striking at the start of a new year?
Seems like a good omen to me!
It’s as if the skies are celebrating with us!

My gut’s telling me this year is gonna
be electrifying!
episode_event_general_newyear_2022/6801_:
We’re prepared for our
first battle of the year!
Let’s let the sparks fly in battle this year!

Being busy at the start of the year is fine, but
spending that time quietly is also nice.

It allows you to calm your mind and think about
your resolutions for the upcoming year.

Yeah, that’s great, too! I guess everyone has their
own way of celebrating.
